item.title: Sourcing App Ideas - Data Collection and Insights
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to identify viable app ideas by aggregating and analyzing user pain points and feature requests from multiple platforms.
